test.name: User is able to search successfully

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to given URL.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the active browser instance to the provided URL.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current page title equals `title`.

kw.name: Clear Element Text
kw.doc: Clears the text value of text entry element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks a button identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the results.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by `locator` exactly contains text `expected`.

kw.name: Get Webelements
kw.doc: Returns list of WebElement objects matching locator.

kw.name: Length Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the length of the given item is correct.
